extendedInfo.description: Do you like wordsearch games ? Well you will love WORD SEARCH !Choose a language, a topic and start a new grid of 120 letters, and be ready !Cross out all the words that are hidden in the grid by sliding from letter to letter and discover the secret word !With its 3 progressive levels of difficulties, its 22 varied themes, its 2 languages available (French/English) and its grid generator, WORD SEARCH will suits to everyone, from 3 to 103 years old.You have already completed all the grids ? Don't worry, do them again and improve your times endlessly :)Follow us on : www.mobile-coolgames.com, twitter.com/Mobile_CGames and on facebook.com/MobileCoolGames

reviews.title: Very good one,
reviews.comment: Its very user friendly. Very chill-laid back type. Its quite good actually
reviews.author: keith musungu

reviews.title: Great word find
reviews.comment: Great. Challenging. Even though sometimes there are two of the same words and it gets confusing. But overall it is a great game. Never boring.
reviews.author: Mike Lopez

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Simple n fun great view as well
reviews.author: Dardra Drake

reviews.title: Best word search so far
reviews.comment: This app is well designed with simple, clear instructions and nice crisp graphics. My only gripe is that sometimes when I highlight a word from the list, it takes 3 or 4 tries to have it confirmed. Great little app to fill in 5 minutes when you\'re waiting or on coffee break!
reviews.author: Nicola Shepherd

reviews.title: Great Word Search Game
reviews.comment: Its a great game to play on your android phone. Just like a real word search puzzle book. Love itt!
reviews.author: Jonathan Francis

reviews.title: D
reviews.comment: I love it is the best I was searching for the longest one of a kind and I am happy with this awesome app
reviews.author: Diana Figueroa

reviews.title: OK game
reviews.comment: Like the game but on some words you have to hit it just right or it won\'t show you found the word, this gives you a slower time.
reviews.author: Alice Von Bosse

reviews.title: Android
reviews.comment: Good concept. Needs better pictures and settings. Dont like the vibratiin when uce found a word
reviews.author: Charlotte Galib

reviews.title: I enjoyed this game very much!
reviews.comment: Fun! Entertaining! User Friendly. Quick.
reviews.author: Susan D Howell

reviews.title: Limited puzzles
reviews.comment: Good puzzles but not enough of them. Once you finish the puzzles listed, you\'re done with the app. Need more puzzles otherwise, you just delete the app.
reviews.author: Denise Paranich

reviews.title: Quite good
reviews.comment: Fun game when you have a few minutes spare. Only aggravation is some words incorrectly spelt, but at least the word list and grid agree. Also, sometimes a word appears twice in the grid, but is only accepted at one location.
reviews.author: Stephen Holgate

reviews.title: Word search free
reviews.comment: This game is soooo awesome. I notice when they dissapear after u complete them. Will I have to download it again after uninstalling? ANYHOO IT\'S GREAT:-)
reviews.author: Audra Reilly

reviews.title: Great fun!
reviews.comment: Love it! Sometimes a little frustrating when you find a word that is needed, but it is also somewhere else on the grid so you\'re not allowed to select the one you found, and have to keep hunting....great free game tho, and I like the way the remaining letters spell a word. Great app, thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a fun variation of the word search game...only thing I wish it had was mor catagories I wii keep playing for sure\tLove this game!
reviews.author: Kathleen Hale

reviews.title: It needs something
reviews.comment: I went over two words several times before it got recognized. Also, when I had to touch the remaining letters, I touched all of them, yet it still showed I needed to touch one more. You need to increase the sensitivity so it recognizes when the letters are being touched. That\'s my thought about the game. Come through with that, and you\'ll get a higher rating. Other than that, it\'s fun. Oh, and throw in some words that are diaginal. These are all up and down, or side to side. Thx.
reviews.author: Rachel Holt

reviews.title: Game is very fun.
reviews.comment: I am finally able to play word search again after finding out I\'m legally blind. The game has nice fonts and graphics. I\'m addicted. Sometimes there are multiples of the same word especially short worfs and you have to search multiple times for the same word. It is nerve wracking. Need to fix that problem.
reviews.author: Sandra Stewart

reviews.title: Jeu fantastique!!
reviews.comment: C\'est formidable (it\'s wonderful). Merci pour la! (Thanks for it!)
reviews.author: Allie Breitmayer

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Wish easier to select letters, and not add letters out of the line currently being selected, but overall very fun to play
reviews.author: Allin Orfold

reviews.comment: Fun game when it loads!!!  Its timed but it wastes time when it wont let you highlight the letters.  Fun if it works right.
reviews.author: Eda Sullivent

reviews.title: Really good
reviews.comment: Works like a treat and good set of choice.
reviews.author: Emily-beth Green
